contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21ST day of April, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby denied without prejudice to petitioner to file any claims of ineffectiveness in a petition pursuant to the Post Conviction Relief Act, 42 Pa.C.S. §§ 9541-46. See Commonwealth v. Grant, 572 Pa. 48, 813 A.2d 726 (2002).
